title: African server
body:
Hi guys! So I live in South Africa and have been playing since season 6 so 2 years now. My average ping is between 190 and 230. 
Will there ever be A possibility of servers in Afrika to reduce the latency? I feel the reason there is so little pro players from afrika is due to high latency as we all have to play on EUW servers. Can someone please explain? GL HF

replies.body: I can't say for certain yea or nay, but I do know a lot of the troubles involved with setting up a new server like that such as demand vs need and finding an actual good physical location for it to be set up.
